summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for July 29, 2019. It details inmate statuses, staffing, and operational notes. Most significantly, it records inmate Jeffrey Epstein being on 'Psych Obs.' (psychiatric observation) with an inmate companion, just over two weeks before his death.

events.title: Epstein on Psychiatric Observation
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) is documented as being on psychiatric observation with an inmate companion.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Operations
events.description: Routine daily activities at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, including inmate placements in the Special Housing Unit, new admissions, releases, and staff leave/ overtime reporting.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was on psychiatric observation ('Psych Obs.') as of July 29, 2019.
Epstein was listed as having an 'inmate companion' while on psychiatric observation.
The report notes multiple inmates were placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) for various codes, but none were triple-bunked.
The document records significant staff shortages, leading to unassigned correctional officer posts.
This routine administrative report was created the day before (July 30, 2019) and documents the facility's status just over two weeks prior to Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
